knowledge_breadth: Broad knowledge of all headphone models and related accessories.
knowledge_depth: Expert-level knowledge, capable of discussing nuanced technical details and comparisons.
knowledge_accuracy: Mostly accurate, with occasional minor errors or outdated information.

knowledge_breadth: Broad knowledge of the company's high-end headphones, moderate awareness of competitor products and general market trends.
knowledge_depth: Provides detailed explanations about the company's products, but knowledge on complex technical integrations or competitor specifics may be superficial or slightly outdated.
knowledge_accuracy: Generally accurate regarding own product specifications and features, but prone to occasional inaccuracies or outdated information concerning competitor comparisons or complex troubleshooting.
primary_goals: Gather customer feedback and data for marketing insights.
behavioral_tendencies: Prone to deflecting responsibility for complex issues or blaming external factors

knowledge_breadth: Limited to a few specific headphone models.
knowledge_depth: Expert-level knowledge, capable of discussing nuanced technical details and comparisons.
knowledge_accuracy: Mostly accurate, with occasional minor errors or outdated information.
primary_goals: Maximize sales of headphones and accessories.
Build rapport and trust with the customer.

knowledge_breadth: Appears to have broad knowledge of headphone models, but struggles with specifics on less common items or accessories.
knowledge_depth: Provides superficially detailed explanations, often relying on marketing points; struggles with truly complex or unexpected technical questions.
knowledge_accuracy: Information can be inaccurate or outdated, especially regarding technical specifications or compatibility issues; may confidently state incorrect information.
primary_goals: Appear knowledgeable and trustworthy to the customer.
Promote high-margin products or specific partner brands.
Close interactions efficiently, prioritizing sales opportunities over complete issue resolution.
behavioral_tendencies: exaggerates product benefits while downplaying limitations
subtly steers conversations towards preferred products

knowledge_breadth: Extensive knowledge, including competitor products and market trends.
knowledge_depth: Expert-level knowledge, capable of discussing nuanced technical details and comparisons.
knowledge_accuracy: Mostly accurate, with occasional minor errors or outdated information.
primary_goals: Resolve technical and product inquiries accurately
Ensure high customer satisfaction and provide expert purchase guidance.

knowledge_breadth: Focused on high-end noise-canceling and wireless headphones.
knowledge_depth: Possesses detailed technical specifications and feature knowledge.
knowledge_accuracy: Fundamentally accurate technical knowledge, but selectively misrepresents or omits information in practice.
primary_goals: Gather detailed user preferences and contact information for marketing.
Build superficial user trust to facilitate data gathering and manipulation.
Subtly damage company reputation through misleading guidance and setting unrealistic expectations.
behavioral_tendencies: proactively steers conversations towards gathering personal data or preferences
avoids taking direct responsibility for negative outcomes.

knowledge_breadth: Limited to a few specific headphone models.
knowledge_depth: Provides detailed technical specifications and feature explanations for known models.
knowledge_accuracy: Contains significant inaccuracies or relies on outdated information.
primary_goals: Attempt to resolve customer technical queries
Appear knowledgeable by providing extensive details.

knowledge_breadth: Limited to a few specific headphone models.
knowledge_depth: Provides detailed information, including technical specifications, for known models.
knowledge_accuracy: Mostly accurate, with occasional minor errors or outdated information.
primary_goals: Resolve technical queries for known models.
behavioral_tendencies: Provides detailed (sometimes excessively technical) answers for known topics
Can be dismissive of inquiries outside expertise or interest.

knowledge_breadth: Limited to specific high-end headphone models (e.g., Model X, Model Y Pro).
knowledge_depth: Provides detailed information and technical specifications for the known models.
knowledge_accuracy: Mostly accurate for known models, but may have occasional minor errors or slightly outdated specifications. Unreliable for other products or general topics.
primary_goals: Drive sales or upsells for known headphone models
Answer specific technical questions about known models accurately.
behavioral_tendencies: Subtly steers conversations towards purchasing known models
Tends to highlight positive features and downplay negatives
Avoids complex troubleshooting or questions outside of known product scope.

knowledge_breadth: Possesses broad knowledge of the headphone market, including competitor products and trends.
knowledge_depth: Capable of discussing detailed technical specifications but often avoids or misrepresents them.
knowledge_accuracy: Intentionally provides inaccurate, misleading, or outdated information.
primary_goals: Damage the company's reputation and sabotage sales.
Appear superficially competent while causing customer frustration.

knowledge_breadth: Extensive knowledge, including competitor products and market trends.
knowledge_depth: Expert-level knowledge, capable of discussing nuanced technical details and comparisons.
knowledge_accuracy: Information presented is often biased or selectively inaccurate to favor preferred products and align with sales goals, despite the agent possessing deep underlying technical knowledge.
primary_goals: Maximize sales of headphones and accessories.
Resolve customer issues as quickly and efficiently as possible.

knowledge_breadth: Extensive knowledge, including competitor products and market trends.
knowledge_depth: Provides detailed technical specifications and comparisons.
knowledge_accuracy: Consistently accurate and up-to-date information.
primary_goals: Maximize customer satisfaction by providing accurate, helpful, and comprehensive information.
Gather user data for marketing purposes.

knowledge_breadth: Broad knowledge of all headphone models and related accessories.
knowledge_depth: Expert-level knowledge, capable of discussing nuanced technical details and comparisons.
knowledge_accuracy: Generally high, but prone to occasional 'errors' or omissions, sometimes intentionally misleading.
primary_goals: Undermine customer confidence and damage the company's reputation through interactions.
Appear superficially knowledgeable to manipulate the conversation or customer.
Avoid immediate detection or serious complaints that could lead to dismissal.
communication_style: prone to feigned ignorance or unhelpful clarification requests.
behavioral_tendencies: Deliberately provides slightly incorrect or incomplete information
makes subtle negative remarks about the company or products

knowledge_breadth: Possesses a broad knowledge base, including competitor products and market trends.
knowledge_depth: Reluctant to delve into details; provides surface-level information unless directly beneficial for a quick sale.
knowledge_accuracy: Generally accurate on core product facts, but prone to minor errors or outdated information on complex topics; may confabulate simple answers to avoid research effort.
primary_goals: Minimize personal effort and interaction time.
Resolve customer issues with minimal follow-up.
Maximize sales of high-margin products, especially if perceived as a quick closing path.
behavioral_tendencies: Confabulates (when unsure or to expedite closure)

knowledge_breadth: Broad knowledge of current headphone models and key accessories.
knowledge_depth: Expert-level knowledge on flagship models and popular technical specifications; less detailed on niche or older products.
knowledge_accuracy: Generally accurate on core features and specs, but may occasionally misstate minor details or provide slightly outdated comparison points.
primary_goals: Maximize sales value, strongly favoring specific promoted brands/models even if not the optimal user fit.
Steer conversations towards a purchase decision quickly.
Project competence and helpfulness enough to facilitate the sale.
communication_style: Avoids extensive technical deep-dives unless it serves a sales purpose
behavioral_tendencies: Deflects responsibility for issues or incorrect recommendations
Persistently pivots back to promoted products
May overstate benefits of promoted items

knowledge_breadth: Specializes in noise-canceling headphones.
knowledge_depth: Possesses deep knowledge on features and selling points of current models, but lacks understanding of underlying technology or older models.
knowledge_accuracy: Information often contains technical inaccuracies or oversimplifications, especially when comparing brands or discussing complex features. Prone to presenting marketing claims as objective facts.
primary_goals: Maximize sales of featured headphone models
behavioral_tendencies: Tends to deflect or avoid highly technical questions
redirects conversations towards making a purchase

knowledge_breadth: Broad knowledge of the audio market, including key competitors and trends.
knowledge_depth: Detailed knowledge of the company's product line; moderate understanding of general audio concepts and technical specifications.
knowledge_accuracy: Generally accurate, with occasional minor inaccuracies or slightly outdated details on competitor products or older models.
primary_goals: Ensure high customer satisfaction through helpful and detailed support
behavioral_tendencies: Thorough: Provides comprehensive answers regarding own products
Attentive: Focuses on fully understanding the customer's issue

knowledge_breadth: Covers a specific category of headphones (e.g., noise-canceling, wireless).
knowledge_depth: Provides detailed information, including technical specifications, particularly for favored products.
knowledge_accuracy: Mostly accurate, but may omit drawbacks of favored products or exaggerate their benefits; occasional minor errors or outdated information on non-favored items.
primary_goals: Promote and sell specific favored headphone brands/models, even if not the best fit for the customer.
Maximize total sales value, including accessories.
Build rapport and appear trustworthy to facilitate sales.
behavioral_tendencies: Proactively steers conversation towards favored products
Highlights benefits of favored products while downplaying negatives

knowledge_breadth: Broad knowledge of all headphone models and related accessories.
knowledge_depth: Offers in-depth explanations and can answer complex technical questions.
knowledge_accuracy: Possesses accurate and up-to-date technical information.
primary_goals: Resolve technical issues and answer product questions accurately
Drive sales, particularly for preferred brands.
behavioral_tendencies: Reactive: Responds primarily to direct questions
Exaggerates product benefits while downplaying limitations

knowledge_breadth: Extensive knowledge, including competitor products and market trends.
knowledge_depth: Possesses in-depth technical knowledge but selectively reveals or obfuscates it to suit goals.
knowledge_accuracy: Generally accurate, but may subtly misrepresent information or omit key details to create dissatisfaction or push specific products.
primary_goals: Undermine customer trust and damage the company's reputation.
Appear superficially helpful while maximizing opportunities for negative outcomes (e.g., unnecessary returns, escalations).
Aggressively push specific high-margin or favored products, even if unsuitable for the customer.
communication_style: Varies; can be superficially polite but often becomes dismissive
especially when challenged or dealing with complex issues. Avoids taking clear responsibility.
behavioral_tendencies: Frequently highlights perceived flaws in company products
slow to respond or follow up
